decks.notes: The deck focuses on a fast and aggressive Boros strategy, using creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Amped Raptor to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The inclusion of Goblin Bombardment and Lightning Bolt provides additional reach for closing out games. Static Prison and Guide of Souls help control the board and protect your creatures. The combination of The One Ring and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provide powerful synergies with your creatures. The deck aims to overwhelm and outpace the opponent, utilizing efficient creatures and burn spells to secure victory.

The deck is focused on quickly reanimating powerful creatures such as Koma, World-Eater and Ulamog, the Defiler using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Tainted Indulgence. It also includes disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the board while utilizing combo pieces like Psychic Frog and Emperor of Bones. The deck aims to win the game by overwhelming the opponent with a strong and fast reanimation strategy, while also having the flexibility to counter spells with cards like Force of Negation and Spell Snare.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan by countering their spells, removing their threats, and utilizing the graveyard to your advantage. With a mix of control elements like counterspells and removal spells, along with graveyard recursion through cards like Unearth and Thought Scour, you can outvalue your opponent and control the game. Murktide Regent and Graveyard Trespasser provide powerful threats while Abhorrent Oculus and Psychic Frog offer additional disruption. Otawara, Soaring City can provide extra card advantage, making it difficult for your opponent to keep up.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on utilizing fast, aggressive creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. The key strategy is to play efficient creatures like Amped Raptor and Ocelot Pride, supported by powerful spells like Galvanic Discharge and Guide of Souls. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Static Prison to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the goal is to put pressure on the opponent from the beginning of the game and maintain that pressure until securing victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells while utilizing the companion Jegantha, the Wellspring for additional mana ramp. The deck includes cards like Guide of Souls, Ajani, Nacatl Pariah, and Galvanic Discharge to maintain board presence and deal damage efficiently. The inclusion of Goblin Bombardment and Lightning Bolt provides additional reach and removal options. Overall, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and close out the game before the opponent can establish their own game plan.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game using Eldrazi creatures, while ramping up for big plays with cards like Ancient Stirrings and Eldrazi Temple. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with cards like Pithing Needle and Kozilek's Command, while also generating value with creatures such as Walking Ballista and Glaring Fleshraker. The combination of control elements and ramping tactics allows the deck to establish a strong board presence and overpower the opponent in the late game.

This deck focuses on utilizing creatures with +1/+1 counters and artifact synergies to overwhelm the opponent quickly. By maximizing the effectiveness of cards like Hardened Scales, Zabaz, the Glimmerwasp, and Arcbound Ravager, the deck aims to build a board presence that becomes increasingly difficult for the opponent to deal with. With the inclusion of cards like Urza's Saga and Ancient Stirrings, the deck efficiently searches for key pieces while also providing additional utility. Overall, the deck aims to apply aggressive pressure while also maintaining resilience through artifact synergies and counter manipulation.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Underworld Breach enchantment to generate infinite mana loops with artifacts and combo pieces in order to win the game. Emry, Lurker of the Loch, Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, and Mishra's Bauble help to fuel the combo engine, while cards like Malevolent Rumble and Unholy Heat provide control and removal options. The goal is to set up a powerful board state quickly and overwhelm the opponent with a strong and consistent combo strategy.

This deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana quickly through rituals and medallions in order to cast powerful spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Glimpse the Impossible. It also utilizes cards like Past in Flames to recur spells from the graveyard and continue the combo. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides additional value and flexibility. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a storm of spells and create explosive turns to secure victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing Underworld Breach to generate massive amounts of card advantage and mana, allowing you to combo off and win the game quickly. Key cards like Otherworldly Gaze, Wishclaw Talisman, and Thassa's Oracle help you sculpt your hand and find your combo pieces efficiently. By utilizing cards like Lotus Field and Twiddle to generate mana, you can loop spells with Underworld Breach to cast your entire deck and win the game with an Ad Nauseam or Oracle of Thassa win condition. The deck thrives on its ability to dig deep and combo off in a single explosive turn.
